definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Did he take away the jade bracelets and agate necklace i gave you last week ?
sentences.chinese: 他有沒有拿走上個禮拜我給你的玉鐲子和瑪瑙項鍊？

sentences.english: Why do you sit there and jingle your bracelets in mere idle sport？
sentences.chinese: 你爲什麼悠閒地坐在那裏，把鐲子玩得丁當作響呢？

sentences.english: Last anneal treatment, left the beauty covered in oxidized silver.
sentences.chinese: 最後一次退火，這時的鐲子裹着薄薄的一層氧化銀。

sentences.english: She looked at the gold charm bracelet I always wore.
sentences.chinese: 她看着我不曾離手的鐲子，上面有一些符咒。

sentences.english: ErNian living down and out, sell black mule to send his bracelets.
sentences.chinese: 二孃生活落魄，賣掉黑騾子送他的鐲子。

sentences.english: The quality of this pair of bloodstone bracelets is very good.
sentences.chinese: 這對雞血石的鐲子成色很好。

definition: weight/pendant/same as 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]/ballad singing accompanied by a 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]
that/that kind of/that sort of/that type of
(usu used in the negative) to be of importance or to matter/to be in the way/to be a hindrance
lit. mandarin ducks playing in the water/fig. to make love
